Title: #121: Shawn Achor—How Happiness Fuels Your Success
Description:
Positive psychology expert Shawn Achor joins for a fascinating conversation on happiness and how it can change your world and your organization. Through his years of research, this former Harvard professor has found that a positive mindset can lead to increased intelligence and creativity. It can even triple your problem-solving skills! And here’s the best part: Happiness is something anyone can cultivate—even in the worst circumstances. We’re also talking with leadership consultant Brad Lomenick on the essential habits you need to get things done.

Another great episode sponsored by our friends at Infusionsoft
